org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.http

Class DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.AbstractMessageContainer<HttpMessage>
      • org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.http.AbstractHttpMessageContainer
        • org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.http.DefaultMultipleHttpMessagesContainer
          • org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.http.DefaultMultipleHistoryReferencesContainer
            • org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.http.DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpMessageContainer, MultipleHistoryReferencesContainer, MultipleHttpMessagesContainer, SelectableHistoryReferencesContainer, SelectableHttpMessagesContainer, SingleHistoryReferenceContainer, SingleHttpMessageContainer, MessageContainer<HttpMessage>, MultipleMessagesContainer<HttpMessage>, SelectableMessagesContainer<HttpMessage>, SingleMessageContainer<HttpMessage>

    public class DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer
extends DefaultMultipleHistoryReferencesContainer
implements SelectableHistoryReferencesContainer
    A default implementation of a SelectableHistoryReferencesContainer.
    Since:
    2.3.0
    See Also:
    SelectableHistoryReferencesContainer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer(String name, Component component)
      Constructs a DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer with no contained messages and with the given container name and component.
      DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer(String name, Component component, List<HistoryReference> historyReferences)
      Constructs a DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer with no selected messages and with the given container name and component and HistoryReferences of contained messages.
      DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer(String name, Component component, List<HistoryReference> historyReferences, List<HistoryReference> selectedHistoryReferences)
      Constructs a DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer with the given container name and component, HistoryReferences of contained messages and HistoryReferences of selected messages.

        component - the GUI component of the container

      • DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer

        public DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer(String name,
                                           Component component,
                                           List<HistoryReference> historyReferences)
        Constructs a DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer with no selected messages and with the given container name and component and HistoryReferences of contained messages.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the container
        component - the GUI component of the container
        historyReferences - the contained HTTP messages, null or empty list if none
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given name or component is null.

      • DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer

        public DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer(String name,
                                           Component component,
                                           List<HistoryReference> historyReferences,
                                           List<HistoryReference> selectedHistoryReferences)
        Constructs a DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer with the given container name and component, HistoryReferences of contained messages and HistoryReferences of selected messages.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the container
        component - the GUI component of the container
        historyReferences - the contained HTTP messages, null or empty list if none
        selectedHistoryReferences - the selected HTTP messages, null or empty list if none
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given name or component is null.

      • getSelectedMessages

        public List<HttpMessage> getSelectedMessages()
        Description copied from interface: SelectableMessagesContainer
        Returns all the selected messages or an empty List if none.

        No assumptions should be made on the actual implementation type of the List returned by this method (for example, it might be unmodifiable or its elements lazy loaded).

        Note: Extra care should be taken when getting the messages from the list since it might return null which indicate that an error occurred while getting a message (for example, failed to read a persisted message).

        Specified by:
        getSelectedMessages in interface SelectableMessagesContainer<HttpMessage>
        Returns:
        a List with all the selected messages, never null.

      • getSelectedHistoryReference

        public HistoryReference getSelectedHistoryReference()
        Description copied from interface: SelectableHistoryReferencesContainer
        Returns the HistoryReference associated with the selected message or null if none.

        If multiple messages are selected the HistoryReference of the first one is returned.

        Specified by:
        getSelectedHistoryReference in interface SelectableHistoryReferencesContainer
        Returns:
        the selected message or null if none.

      • getSelectedHistoryReferences

        public List<HistoryReference> getSelectedHistoryReferences()
        Description copied from interface: SelectableHistoryReferencesContainer
        Returns all the HistoryReferences associated with the selected messages.

        No assumptions should be made on the actual implementation type of the List returned by this method.

        Specified by:
        getSelectedHistoryReferences in interface SelectableHistoryReferencesContainer
        Returns:
        a List with all the HistoryReferences associated with the selected messages, never null.
        See Also:
        SelectableMessagesContainer.getNumberOfSelectedMessages()
